data.actual_result: You are in a situation where channel has no unreads but still has a ping indicator. This ping is persistent : it cannot be removed unless you view it on Desktop or wait for new messages to be sent in this channel. Restarting Discord or even clearing the cache doesn't remove it.
data.expected_result: Ping shouldn't remain stuck in anyway
data.short_description: If someone edits a message containing an everyone tag after you restarted the app, the ping indicator will come back and get stuck (Bounty of ticket HIYQTipa)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have user A on Desktop with everyone perms, and user B on Android, both users on same server but viewing different channels - User A sends an @ everyone - User B reads the ping and goes back to a different channel - User B restarts Discord by killing the app from Recent Tasks and reopens it - Have user A edit his message containing the everyone tag
